questions.question: To clean laptops, which two products are recommended? (Choose two.)
What are three common input devices found on laptops? (Choose three.)
Which two statements are true of a laptop CPU when compared to a desktop CPU? (Choose two.)
options: Laptop CPUs operate at higher clock speeds.
Laptop CPUs use smaller cooling devices.
Laptop CPUs are interchangeable with desktop CPUs.
Laptop CPUs are designed to produce less heat.
answer: Laptop CPUs use smaller cooling devices.
Laptop CPUs are designed to produce less heat.

questions.question: A technician has been asked to decide which laptop components should be cleaned on a monthly basis as part of a maintenance routine. What are two examples of components that should be included? (Choose two.)
What are two methods typically used on a mobile device to provide internet connectivity? (Choose two.)

A customer brings a laptop into a computer repair shop. The technician can tell that the laptop is powered on by the power light, but nothing displays on the screen. What are two possible issues that could cause this symptom? (Choose two.)
options: The laptop has gone into sleep mode.
The screen cutoff switch needs cleaning or is damaged.
answer: The laptop has gone into sleep mode.
The screen cutoff switch needs cleaning or is damaged.

questions.question: Which type of RAM modules are designed for the space limitations of laptops?
What is a design consideration for mobile CPUs used in laptops compared with desktop CPUs?
options: They are interchangeable with desktop CPUs.
They require smaller cooling mechanisms than desktops do.
They operate at higher clock speeds than desktops do.
They consume more power than desktops do.
questions.answer: They require smaller cooling mechanisms than desktops do.

questions.question: Which protocol can be used to transfer messages from an email server to an email client?
What is a characteristic of laptop motherboards?
options: Laptop motherboards use the same form factors as desktop motherboards.
Laptop motherboards use standard form factors.
Laptop motherboard components are compatible with desktop motherboards.

questions.question: What device setting is used to share the cellular WAN connection of a phone in order to allow other devices to connect to the Internet?
Which laptop component is commonly found in the laptop lid?
What is the purpose of a digitizer in a mobile device?
options: to convert analog video signals to digital ones
to convert digital music to analog for headphone delivery
to convert user touch actions to digital input signals
questions.answer: to convert user touch actions to digital input signals

questions.question: What type of backlight is used in an LED display?
Where is an integrated microphone normally located on a laptop?
options: near the exterior on either side of the keyboard by the plastic frame
in the top of the display
under the keyboard near the pointing device or touchpad
questions.answer: in the top of the display

questions.question: Which ACPI state turns the CPU and RAM off and copies the contents of RAM to a temporary file on the hard disk?
What could be used in conjunction with a laptop in order to read flash media?
Which step would be important in the removal of laptop memory?
options: Align the memory module notch at a 45-degree angle and press to release.
Attach an AC adapter before starting the procedure.
Press outward on the clips that hold the memory module.
Gently press down on the memory module until it releases from the slot.
questions.answer: Press outward on the clips that hold the memory module.

questions.question: Which laptop component would be considered an FRU?
Which characteristic should be considered when a replacement mobile device battery is being selected?
options: It has the same power ratings.
It is from the same manufacturer.
It is a mini-ATX form factor.
questions.answer: It has the same power ratings.

questions.question: Which specialized mobile device is commonly used with VR and AR?
Which cellular technology supports speeds up to 20 Gbps?
A technician is configuring a device and the device shows that it is pairing. Which mobile technology is being used?
Which app is used to synchronize data to an iOS-based mobile device?
A technician has been called on site to help a user who has a laptop problem. At which point should the technician look online for additional possible solutions to a laptop problem?
options: before establishing a theory of probable cause
after testing a theory to determine the cause
questions.answer: after testing a theory to determine the cause

A technician working on a cell phone must provide documentation regarding the phone. Where would the technician find the IMSI information?
options: on the SIM card or programmed on the phone
questions.answer: on the SIM card or programmed on the phone

questions.question: An entrepreneur is opening a computer store in a small town and wants to display a few laptops in the store, but is concerned about security. What physical laptop feature might assist in addressing this issue?
A technician is troubleshooting a laptop with an unresponsive touchscreen. What could be the probable cause?
options: The DC jack is not grounded or is loose.
The battery is not seated properly.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and the GPS is not functioning. What is a probable cause for this situation?
A technician is working on a laptop and the GPS is not functioning. What is a probable cause for this situation?
A technician is working on a laptop and the GPS is not functioning. What is a probable cause for this situation?
A technician is working on a laptop and an app is not loading. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: An app needs to be restarted.
More than one app is open simultaneously.
questions.answer: An app needs to be restarted.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an app is not loading. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: An app needs to be restarted.
The Num Lock key is depressed.
The screen refresh rate is too low.
questions.answer: An app needs to be restarted.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an app is not responding. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: An app needs to be restarted.
The Num Lock key is depressed.
questions.answer: An app needs to be restarted.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an error message about decryption appears when opening an email. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: The Num Lock key is depressed.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an error message about decryption appears when opening an email. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: The screen refresh rate is too low.
The Num Lock key is depressed.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an error message about decryption appears when opening an email. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: The security certificate is not recognized.
The Num Lock key is depressed.
questions.answer: The security certificate is not recognized.

questions.question: A technician is working on a laptop and an error message about decryption appears when opening an email. What is a probable cause for this situation?
options: The security certificate is not recognized.
The Num Lock key is depressed.
questions.answer: The security certificate is not recognized.
